page.title: 03A Typical day
page.content: 7.25am I get up,get washed and dressed 8.00am I have cereal,toast,orange drink and tea for my breakfast. 8.30am I put my reading book,felt pens, packed lunch,sports kit in my satchel. 9.00am I walk to school with Mummy. My lessons are Maths,English,Geography, History,Scripture,Science,Music,Nature Study,Art.10.40-11.00 is playtime. 12.00pm I have sandwiches,cake,an apple bag of crisps,tea or squash for lunch. 1.00-1.30pm Playtime.Then we have lessons until 3.30pm with a break from 2.40-3.00pm.Afterwards I walk home with my Mummy and the dog. 4.00pm My brother comes from his school we have tea and biscuits and play or watch TV. 6.00pm Daddy comes back from work and we have dinner. 8.00pm I clean my teeth and go to bed.
